head.title: The Direct Project: Policy Enablement Engine

section.name: Overview
section.p: The direct-policy module is a library containing the policy enable engine for the DirectProject Java reference implementation. It implements the ideas and constructs introduced in the Policy Enablement proposal document and contain APIs to create and validate policies for x509 certificates.
For more detail on developing and configuring policy definitions, refer to the users guide.
